summary: A Fullstack Engineer in the AI tech team at Crypto.com, I am involed in many projects. I am known for my fast learning abilities and strong teamwork skills. I also use the skills and technologies picked up in Crypto.com to introduce generative AI to my personal projects. For my personal growth, I am constantly learning new technologies and studying new subjects.

experience.title: Senior Fullstack Engineer | AI Tech
experience.summary: Worked in a team of over 20 engineers focused on researching and developing AI products for both internal and external use. Maintained close working relationships with different departments to understand their needs and requirements.
highlights: Social Media App: accomplished a monthly 4.5% retention rate with 400k daily active chats by developing and maintaining the social media platform of 500k users. The platform uses generative AI to allow users to create and share their own AI-generated content.

experience.title: Fullstack Engineer | AI Tech
highlights: AgentFun: developed the agent chatbot system for the AgentFun team to allow their users to create custom agents and interact with it on websites, telegram and discord. Over 300 agents have been created as of now.

Ava Signals: developed the MVP for a market signal tool that has been deployed and integrated into the Crypto.com app, accessed by more than a million of users daily and increased daily trade volume by over 5%.

Chino: launched an internal marketing tool that assists the growth department in creating marketing campaigns and material. The tool has been used to create over 100 ads and has improved team efficiency.

experience.title: Software Developer | Team Lead
experience.summary: Worked with and managed a team of 5 developers, primarily focused on full stack development.
highlights: BlackScale: Launched 777 physically backed token t-shirts on the Ethereum network in collaboration with BlackScale by developing the market platform to trade the token and integrating the NFC chip interface.
DreamDomain: Developed our first NFT and metaverse product. Successfully ran a campaign showcasing the product to other Web3 natives and brands.

experience.title: Lab Technician
experience.summary: A BSL-3 clinical diagnostics facility primary focused on processing Covid-19 samples. During my time as the lab technician, I am always working towards a healthy and jovial work relationship with my colleagues, lab managers and other ground staff to keep the mood up in the desolate period that is Covid-19.
highlights: Responsible for the samples processing and analysis as well as stock management.
Conducted manual sample processing with consistent quality and minimal contamination.

certifications.title: NGINX Fundamentals: High Performance Servers from Scratch

projects.title: Forex & Crypto Signals Bot
projects.description: A bot that scans market chart for signals and immediately notify users through a telegram chat. The bot also checks the news for any major events that might affect the market and notify users of the event.

projects.title: Butler.events
projects.description: A platform that connects event organisers with venues and vendors.

projects.title: Kuis
projects.description: An experimental quiz platform that evaluates user personalities through odd quizzes.

interests.title: Algorithmic trading
interests.description: I spend time researching and developing my own chart theories, testing them through backtests.

interests.title: Pottery
interests.description: During my free time, I spend my time at the pottery studio, creating my own pottery pieces.

interests.title: Gym and fitness
